description: LOCKTERA is a secure data storage and sharing service that allows users to control access to shared files using various security features. One of the ways LOCKTERA users can share files with each other is by bundling them into an archive , known as a TERA file.

TERA files are encrypted to prevent unauthorized users from accessing the files they contain. Only users who satisfy a TERA file's specified security requirements can open it, and they can open it only in LOCKTERA apps.
